DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the safety and tolerability of the an adjuvanted influenza vaccine combined with CpG7909 at three different doses of CpG 7909 as a single intramuscular (IM) administration in healthy adults. Safety will be assessed by observation of symptoms, physical examination findings and laboratory safety testing.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability, Immunogenicity And CPG Dosage Finding Study of Novartis CpG Adjuvanted Flu Vaccine
